subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees planned to offer salary arbitration to the left-handed reliever Ron Villone before Friday night’s midnight deadline, which would ensure them of receiving a 2007 draft choice if another team signs him.
snippet: The Yankees planned to offer salary arbitration to the left-handed reliever Ron Villone before Friday night’s midnight deadline, which would ensure them of receiving a 2007 draft choice if another team signs him.
